Container.Name: plex

Branch.TagDescription: DEPRECATED - Stable releases with Bionic baseimage

Container.Overview: [Plex](https://plex.tv) organizes video, music and photos from personal media libraries and streams them to smart TVs, streaming boxes and mobile devices. This container is packaged as a standalone Plex Media Server. has always been a top priority. Straightforward design and bulk actions mean getting things done faster.

Config.Name: Appdata
Config.Description: Plex library location. *This can grow very large, 50gb+ is likely for a large collection.*

Config.Name: Path: /tv
Config.Description: Media goes here. Add as many as needed e.g. `/movies`, `/tv`, etc.

Config.Name: Path: /movies
Config.Description: Media goes here. Add as many as needed e.g. `/movies`, `/tv`, etc.

Config.Name: VERSION
Config.Description: Set whether to update plex or not - see Application Setup section.

Config.Name: PLEX_CLAIM
Config.Description: Optionally you can obtain a claim token from https://plex.tv/claim and input here. Keep in mind that the claim tokens expire within 4 minutes.
